Prince Harry, 33, is often jet-setting around the world, having travelled to the French Riviera and Northern Ireland this year, as well as a secret location for his honeymoon.

He will also visit Australia, New Zealand, Fiji and Tonga later this year on his first royal tour with Meghan as a married couple.

However, Harry also went on a secret trip earlier this year to Botswana, a country special to the pair.

The royal decided to go without his new wife, however, as Meghan did not join him on the trip.
title: Prince Harry’s secret trip abroad to his favourite country - without Meghan Markle

meta_data.description: PRINCE HARRY is to join his wife in Australia and New Zealand later this year, but he chose to go on a secret trip earlier this year without Meghan Markle.
